question: <image 1>What does the ? represent in the nuclear reaction
description:
The image shows a nuclear reaction equation: 

\(^{6}\text{Li}_3\) + ? → \({}^{7}\text{Li}_3\)

In this equation:
- The left side features \(^{6}\text{Li}_3\), which represents Lithium-6 with an atomic number of 3.
- A question mark (?) is present, indicating an unknown particle involved in the reaction.
- The right side shows \({}^{7}\text{Li}_3\), representing Lithium-7 also with an atomic number of 3.

The goal is to determine what the "?" symbolizes in this context.
